paper_metadata.title: MAIN TEXT
paper_metadata.extraction_summary: Extracted information on the TTR gene variant p.(Phe84Ser) including penetrance data and individual records.

patients.phenotype: hereditary transthyretin amyloidosis involving gastrointestinal symptoms, vitreous opacity, and multiple cranial neuropathies

individual_records.phenotype_details: gastrointestinal symptoms, vitreous opacity, and multiple cranial neuropathies
individual_records.evidence_sentence: We report a 30-year-old man involving gastrointestinal symptoms, vitreous opacity, and multiple cranial neuropathies.

functional_data.summary: The variant is associated with hereditary transthyretin amyloidosis.

variants.segregation_data: The variant has been reported in four cases, suggesting it segregates with disease.
variants.additional_notes: Only four cases with this variant have been reported before.
key_quotes: Only four cases with this variant have been reported before.

extraction_metadata.notes: Full text was available for extraction.
